resources.string: New Fingerprint has been added. Enter your app password to continue
A new fingerprint was added to this device, so your password is required.
To add fingerprint go to Settings->Security->Nexus Imprint->Add Fingerprint
Fingerprint is not available currently. So navigating back to login screen.
Now enjoy the best security aspects for other apps and the device!
Add security lock to any apps in order to keep it secure!
Set device lock and enable the toggle button!
Enable Advance Security to lock the device automatically when unauthorised access is made during login for 3 consecutive times!
Open app directly from SecureApp if lock is already set!
You can check your app password by authenticating it with existing SecureApp password or Unique code set during registration!

After setting lock for an app, if the app is uninstalled from the device, PlayStore icon image will be shown for that app. You can get the app from PlayStore by clicking on the icon and then click on set icon and select appropriate app to replace.
Edit user details by clicking on the profile option after login!
Set user profile image by clicking on the image and select image from gallery or from camera!
Customize app lock theme by clicking on the right top corner and clicking on Change Theme in App Lock screen.
Set invisible pattern for the App Lock!
You can remove app lock by swiping the row of the app from left to right or vice versa and then click OK
You can check your device password by authenticating it with existing SecureApp password or Unique code set during registration!
Enable Advance Security to lock the device automatically.
Check App password through SecureApp password/Unique code!
If you want to install new App ,directly add App from the SecureApp. Get the app from PlayStore by clicking on the PlayStore icon and then click on set icon and select appropriate app to replace.
Your device supports biometric fingerprint feature. Now login with just a single touch!
Place your finger over the device fingerprint sensor when the dialog appears!
If the fingerprint authentication is successful it will then redirect you to Home Screen!
Please sign up first to use this app. This app will help you to secure other apps and the device by adding lock which is customizable.
Please turn on the service for App Locker to work
